Class PairsTrade

java.lang.Object
quacooker.trading.PairsTrade
public class PairsTrade extends Object
The PairsTrade class represents a pairs trade involving two coins or assets. It stores the details of both trades and allows for selling the positions, calculating the value of the trades, and computing the trading fees.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PairsTrade(Trade coin1Trade, Trade coin2Trade)
    Constructs a new PairsTrade with the given trades for coin1 and coin2.

  • Constructor Details

    • PairsTrade

      public PairsTrade(Trade coin1Trade, Trade coin2Trade)
      Constructs a new PairsTrade with the given trades for coin1 and coin2.
      Parameters:
      coin1Trade - The Trade object for the first coin.
      coin2Trade - The Trade object for the second coin.

  • Method Details

    • getCoin1Trade

      public Trade getCoin1Trade()
      Retrieves the trade details for the first coin in the pair.
      Returns:
      The Trade object representing the first coin's trade.

    • getCoin2Trade

      public Trade getCoin2Trade()
      Retrieves the trade details for the second coin in the pair.
      Returns:
      The Trade object representing the second coin's trade.

    • isSold

      public boolean isSold()
      Checks whether the pairs trade has been sold.
      Returns:
      true if the trade has been sold, false otherwise.

    • sell

      public void sell(double coin1Price, double coin2Price, LocalDate sellingDate)
      Sells both coin trades at the given prices and sets the selling date.
      Parameters:
      coin1Price - The price of the first coin at the time of selling.
      coin2Price - The price of the second coin at the time of selling.
      sellingDate - The date when the trade is sold.

    • calculateValue

      public double calculateValue(double coin1Price, double coin2Price)
      Calculates the total value of the pair of trades based on the current prices of both coins.
      Parameters:
      coin1Price - The current price of the first coin.
      coin2Price - The current price of the second coin.
      Returns:
      The total value of the pair of trades.

    • getSellingDate

      public LocalDate getSellingDate()
      Retrieves the date when the pairs trade was sold.
      Returns:
      The LocalDate representing the selling date, or null if the trade has not been sold.

    • getTradingFee

      public double getTradingFee()
      Calculates the total trading fees for the pair of trades.
      Returns:
      The sum of the trading fees for both trades.
